title: I.. already don't like facing Senna
body:
I'm not here to whine too much, but she feels.. so unfun to play against. Her Q hurts a lot, her root skillshot thingy is deceptive too. I'm tired of seeing stealth "supports" and supports that build lethality and stomp. I'm sure she'll probably get nerfed soon but I already just wanna permaban her until that happens. 

Plus if she's doing well as support, well there's two priority targets already. A fed adc and a fed support.

replies.body:
>Plus if she's doing well as support, well there's two priority targets already. A fed adc and a fed support.

Isn't that exactly how it is with *every* squishy support?

Like, correct me if I'm wrong, but Soraka is *always* a priority target, and generally should be the first champion you try to kill. Janna and Sona tend to also be very high priority. Lulu as well.

They're priority for a different reason, but they're still priority.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-11-11T05:17:37.897+0000)
>
> Isn't that exactly how it is with *every* squishy support?
> 
> Like, correct me if I'm wrong, but Soraka is *always* a priority target, and generally should be the first champion you try to kill. Janna and Sona tend to also be very high priority. Lulu as well.
> 
> They're priority for a different reason, but they're still priority.

Yeah but ShE's A mArKsMaN

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-11-11T06:38:17.653+0000)
>
> Yeah but ShE's A mArKsMaN

you clearly never heard of ad lulu

> [{quoted}](name=hazerddex,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2019-11-11T23:25:56.298+0000)
>
> you clearly never heard of ad lulu

We don't talk about that abomination here, this is a Christian board and we shall not talk about the devil
But no one's mentioned Teemo yet

> [{quoted}](name=Lewd Neeko,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-12T00:03:37.615+0000)
>
> But no one's mentioned Teemo yet

Oh child Teemo is a demon but not the devil

> [{quoted}](name=Mahoh,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-11T05:05:03.428+0000)
>
> Don't be such a racist.

Not sure what race has to do with champion balance but ok.

> but she feels.. so unfun to play against.

So the design team accomplished their goal.

i didnt even build her lethality... i built pure supp items and did well... although i do feel like she was doing just a tad too much dmg without any dmg items

i wouldnt mind a little dmg nerf but i think she plays really well
Built senna as adc, damage is not comparable to other adcs and honestly a dmg nerf would make her obsolete even as support.

Her being able to hit turrets with her Q is too much.

Either let Lucian's Q hit the same way or remove it.

Also, just wait and see till Senna becomes new Karma and Kayle on top lane with Kleptomancy, her Q actually procs One Klepto stack.
I think a compromise would be if she Qs a turret, it will only heal allies, not damage enemies as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Durzaka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=000f0003,timestamp=2019-11-13T01:59:18.193+0000)
>
> I think a compromise would be if she Qs a turret, it will only heal allies, not damage enemies as well.

Say that to Solo lane Senna where she can punish melee champions for sitting behind turrets where she gets to both hit a turret for a turret plating while damaging the enemy at the same time.

ummm ok?

Thats literally what I said should be nerfed. If she Qs a turret, then only the healing portion of the Q should active, not the damaging portion.

> [{quoted}](name=Durzaka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=000f000300000000,timestamp=2019-11-13T18:25:07.814+0000)
>
> ummm ok?
> 
> Thats literally what I said should be nerfed. If she Qs a turret, then only the healing portion of the Q should active, not the damaging portion.

No, if she Q's a turret then she should NOT damage the champion behind it and NOT heal for the damage dealt.
She shouldn't be healing for damage dealt to structures, no champion does that not even with ravenous hunter.

...

Her Q isnt a life steal heal. The amount it heals is not based on how much damage it does.

It is 2 separate calculations, the heal has its own AP and AD ratio attached to it.

She NEEDS to be able to Q turrets because her heal requires a target, and she needs to be able to use it for herself with at least SOME control, not just when there are enemies in front of her. How many other heals have a restriction like that? The closest i can think of his Sorakas only being usable on Allies, but that is because she sacrifices her own HP to heal and has a heal on another part of her kit.

> [{quoted}](name=Durzaka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=000f00030000000000000000,timestamp=2019-11-14T06:24:16.537+0000)
>
> ...
> 
> Her Q isnt a life steal heal. The amount it heals is not based on how much damage it does.
> 
> It is 2 separate calculations, the heal has its own AP and AD ratio attached to it.
> 
> She NEEDS to be able to Q turrets because her heal requires a target, and she needs to be able to use it for herself with at least SOME control, not just when there are enemies in front of her. How many other heals have a restriction like that? The closest i can think of his Sorakas only being usable on Allies, but that is because she sacrifices her own HP to heal and has a heal on another part of her kit.

Who the fuck said it was a lifesteal heal?

Jesus Christ you are pissing me off with your trolling.

> [{quoted}](name=Vlada Cut,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-11-11T20:39:10.855+0000)
>
> Her being able to hit turrets with her Q is too much.
> 
> Either let Lucian's Q hit the same way or remove it.
> 
> Also, just wait and see till Senna becomes new Karma and Kayle on top lane with Kleptomancy, her Q actually procs One Klepto stack.

Klepto will be gone in 8 days so I fail to see the problem.
Aaah yes, Klepto Senna, my sleeper OP pick.
Klepto is being removed isn't it?

Kinda off topic but not really.

Does anyone else lag when Senna ults?

My friends and I were vs a Senna last night and even players on the enemy team noticed that when Senna ults their ping shot up to 800+ for about 2 to 3 seconds before going back down. It was ONLY when Senna ulted though and it didn't matter where she was on the map.

I faced her today in lane and didnt find her too over the top, but then I had a senna support who actually outdamaged me (on jhin), and I was doing a lot that game.
I don't know why she needs a global ult, at least with the damage portion, they could have made it like an umbra/penumbra, where the umbra cone (perhaps lux length) does damage, and after that, the penumbra (surrounding part) does the heal/shield.
Her stun does feel very lengthy.
These are just some initial thoughts, since for now she feels ok (I'm around Gold), but of course we need to see how she performs at the top level.

Recently, I had a senna obliterate me while I was playing assassin Kayn. I was fed. She only had 5 kills. I hit her with a full combo and she still killed me before I could kill her.  Isn't league of legends fun?

> [{quoted}](name=Emperør Rhaast,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vJwobMv4,comment-id=0019,timestamp=2019-11-12T08:11:06.923+0000)
>
> Recently, I had a senna obliterate me while I was playing assassin Kayn. I was fed. She only had 5 kills. I hit her with a full combo and she still killed me before I could kill her.  Isn't league of legends fun?

What? A fed Blue Kayn can one-shot her before the wind-up of a single cannon shot finishes unless she built GA + Deaths' Dance (taking a whole bunch of damage away from her until full build) or received a ton of heals and shields from someone else. If that was not the case you either missed most of your combo or are flat out lying.
Zyra is the strongest counter. IDK why.
because zyra root can land 95% of the time if you throw it during sennas auto windup. and senna is a squish.
You root her whenever she goes for a soul and repeat.
Well Nami and Sona don't do more than chip damage off the bat, but they do scale pretty well if they get the investment.

These season 9 champion kits are really something else.  What is power budget am i right? Lol.    What concerns me is that the senna's I've seen so far have all done pretty decently, good dmg #s solid poke decent kdas noticeably helping their teammates escape from sticky situations w/ the E.   And this is on release day.   Once people get the hang of playing the champion optimally she is going to be an absolute menace.
I was backing at Toplane tower after winning a 1v2. Enemy Senna ulted me from enemy spawn and I died because that beam for a global ults casts way too fast...10/10 interactive gameplay

Completely agree

Not so much as her numbers or counters but more about her design philosophy.

A support marksman that has infinite scaling that both does a shit ton of damage, but also has a lane-wide ultimate, aoe stealth and root and a semi reliable damage/healing ability. 

At this point I’m questioning Riot competency in terms of reworks and new releases. {{champion:13}} gutted into a EQ EQ noob-friendly high damage mage, {{champion:84}} reworked into a high mobility/damage assassin that had true stealth, then nerfed and buffed over and over to no avail, maintaining 87% presence at worlds, {{champion:39}} comes into the game a broken mess with disarms and insane levels of damage again all targets, tanks included. Worst offender so far has to be {{champion:350}}, lowest win rate on release that’s inherently difficult to balance and work with.

And as I said before that's the problem with champions like Senna because if you nerf her even slightly she'll be too weak and she won't be able to deliver on her role as a Marksman. However, if she's too strong she can't be considered a support anymore.

She literally feels like Morgana, but more damage. Ouch

They are doing whatever they can to convert people to supports. First Pyke and now this.

I played bot lane in blinds so i could learn how to play against her. I actually think shes pretty solid. I think her base damage needs to be lowered to compensate for her crazy damage. She can just put damage on every adc except maybe ezreal and caitlyn. I think her ult was completely over hyped, its good but I dont think its as broken as everyoen thought it was gonna be. I dont have any problems with her sheild and root, but her stealth is a little overpowered. I think it needs to be treated like pyke for the allys inside the invis. Its like a mobile akali shroud but for everyone. overall she seems like your tipical overtunned release character riot does.

No one likes seeing anyone on the enemy team.... I dont see how this is an argument.

Shes an offensive support. Shes also extremely squishy and dies as fast, if not faster than, an adc. Thresh, ali, leona.... Anyone that can lock her down just completely steamroll her.

She's not fun to play with either as an ADC. She quite literally does your job better than you do, and she doesn't even have to farm. Additionally, she also plays more like a carry than a support, resulting in situations where you die and Senna gets to keep fighting because in reality she's just a secondary carry with no consistent support abilities.

What I'm trying to say is, she does your job better than you do and she doesn't help like a traditional support. Thus, she is not fun to play with.

Any champ that can get on top of her counters her hard. AKA any of the current top supports. landing hooks/grabs is even easier with her long wind up auto attack. Basically a free lane if you pick any of the top supports, don't expect to win playing passively with enchanters
I find that Naut just dumpsters her almost the entire time.

I'm pretty sure her Q and soul scaling will get nerfed, but she's really easy to deal with. Just pick something with burst or hard CC and she pops. You don't even have to specifically target her since she doesn't peel well for her carry.
What was annoying is her root hitbox. I'd dodge the projectile and still get hit. It's deceptive.
i don't want to have another senna support, like holy shit they just push and push and have no idea what the fuck they're doing

Here's my question: What are you playing as? She has legit shutdown lanes in bot.

Cait/Karma

Nami generally beats Senna

Long range poke makes her lane miserable and prevents stacking Q Champ stacks.

Hard CC engage like Leona (not Alistar) kills her out of lane

Randuin's can completely negate a TON of her damage, since she's already crit nerfed and late game ALWAYS crits
Tbf, leona can engage on a LOT.
A good Leona will always be aggressive vs Senna. If Senna is dead, she's not stacking. It plays like a Nami (as the Senna equiv) lane, except Leona counters roots.
I play Leona into her...works pretty well every time.

I honestly have no problem facing her. It could be that all the Sennas Ive been against were trash, and the fact that I haven’t laned against her but eh. People are like certain junglers will have problems ganking against her, but I have honestly had no problems killing/pressuring her as Kindred.

The only part that gets me is her ult; unlike other global ults it travels stupidly fast and if you’re low health and in dead center it’s either flash or die (or have a long dash).
She's at the top of my permaban list now, because she's broken af.
Idk what are u talking about her Q dmg is totally fine and pretty slow, but ult is pretty fast and  reaction to dodge is required.
